abstract: Preliminary figures released on Thursday indicated that growth in Japan’s gross domestic product slowed to an annualized rate of 1.9 percent in the third quarter of 2013.
snippet: Preliminary figures released on Thursday indicated that growth in Japan’s gross domestic product slowed to an annualized rate of 1.9 percent in the third quarter of 2013.
lead_paragraph: TOKYO — After a surprising spurt of strong growth in the first half of the year, the Japanese economy seems to be running out of steam as exports and consumer spending show signs of weakening.

headline.main: After Strong Growth in First Half of 2013, the Japanese Economy Hits a Snag
headline.print_headline: After Strong Growth in First Half of 2013, the Japanese Economy Hits a Snag

abstract: For its latest set-top box, Apple recommends an Internet connection of at least 2.5 megabits per second. Plus, how to shed the “Recommended for You” notification on Android.
snippet: For its latest set-top box, Apple recommends an Internet connection of at least 2.5 megabits per second. Plus, how to shed the “Recommended for You” notification on Android.
lead_paragraph: Q. How fast does my Internet connection have to be to stream movies on an Apple TV?

headline.main: Getting Up to Speed With an Apple TV, and Ditching Android Widgets
